synopsis: Vote to pass a bill that establishes a rebate system for zero-emission vehicles.
name: SB 2570 - Establishes Rebate System For Zero-Emission Vehicles - Hawaii Key Vote
pg: Highlights: Establishes rebate program to incentivize installation of a zero-emission hydrogen vehicle fueling system that provides (Sec. 1): $200,000 for the installation of a hydrogen fueling system; and $200,000 for upgrades in fuel capacity of hydrogen fueling systems. Requires the public utilities commission to review applications for rebates (Sec. 1). Requires submission of rebate application no later than 12 months after the fueling system was installed or upgraded (Sec. 1). Requires that the public utilities program gives rebate priority to publicly available hydrogen fueling systems (Sec. 1). Reduces gas tax funds allocated to electric vehicle charging programs and re-appropriates them to the hydrogen fueling system rebate fund (Sec. 2).
